Body:
g = decode('(a :ARG "string")')
assert g.triples == [('a', ':instance', None), ('a', ':ARG', '"string"')]
g = decode('(a :ARG symbol)')
assert g.triples == [('a', ':instance', None), ('a', ':ARG', 'symbol')]
g = decode('(a :ARG -1.0e-2)')
assert g.triples == [('a', ':instance', None), ('a', ':ARG', '-1.0e-2')]
g = decode('(a :ARG 15)')
assert g.triples == [('a', ':instance', None), ('a', ':ARG', '15')]
g = decode('(one / 1)')
assert g.triples == [('one', ':instance', '1')]
g = decode('(one / "a string")')
assert g.triples == [('one', ':instance', '"a string"')]
g = decode('(g / go :null_edge (x20 / 876-9))')
assert g.triples == [('g', ':instance', 'go'), ('g', ':null_edge', 'x20'),
    ('x20', ':instance', '876-9')]
